EPAM Regulations in ECL are divided into two broad categories: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ethics Line \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"and\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Compliance Assurance Resources\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". While Ethics Line primarily contains all policies related to organization's ethical requirements, Compliance Assurance Resources are loaded with almost all required documents for fulfilling EPAM's compliance to international standards, global delivery requirements and internal support services. We recommend all EPAMers to get acquainted with the new structure of artifacts at ECL so that these can be located with ease when you need them.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":80491,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0f272de4-7e2a-4655-889c-a7f3236c6e6e/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0f272de4-7e2a-4655-889c-a7f3236c6e6e/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture1.png\",\"name\":\"Picture1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"0f272de4-7e2a-4655-889c-a7f3236c6e6e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":624,\"height\":328},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/SitePages/Policy/Parent
